## Scheduler type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Scheduler = {
    withPropagate: (visitorFn: (v: (dep: Dependency) => void) => (subscribers: Dependency) => void) => (subscribers: Dependency) => void;
    dispose: <T extends ScheduledNode>(node: T, cleanup: (node: T) => void) => void;
    startBatch: () => number;
    endBatch: () => number;
    flush: () => void;
};
```
